mapper.select: select count(*) from job where j_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' or j_intro like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select * from job, user_info where j_u_id = u_id order by j_no desc
select * from job, user_info where j_no = #{j_no} and j_u_id = u_id
mapper.update: update job set j_title = #{j_title}, j_start_date = #{j_start_date}, j_end_date = #{j_end_date}, j_start_time = #{j_start_time}, j_end_time = #{j_end_time}, j_area = #{j_area}, j_intro = #{j_intro}, j_pic = #{j_pic} where j_no = #{j_no}
update job set j_view = j_view + 1 where j_no = #{j_no}
